languages.text: Внушительный меч с лезвием покрытым кровью, которая никогда не запекается. Сжимая его в руках, владелец постоянно испытывает непередаваемую ярость.
An imposing blade covered in blood that never clots. The wielder is consumed by unspeakable rage while holding this sword.
languages.original_text: Внушительный меч с лезвием покрытым кровью, которая никогда не запекается. Сжимая его в руках, владелец постоянно испытывает непередаваемую ярость.

traits.locale_text: An imposing blade covered in blood that never clots. The owner is consumed by unspeakable rage while holding this sword.

An imposing blade covered in blood that never clots. The wielder is consumed by unspeakable rage while holding this sword.

languages.text: Una imponente hoja bañada en sangre que nunca se seca. Cuando se empuña esta espada, el usuario se siente consumido por una furia indescriptible.
languages.original_text: An imposing blade covered in blood that never clots. The wielder is consumed by unspeakable rage while holding this sword.

traits.locale_text: Una imponente hoja bañada en sangre que nunca se seca. Cuando se empuña esta espada, el usuario se siente consumido por una furia indescriptible.

languages.text: 气势非凡的刀刃上，沾满了永不凝固的鲜血。手持这把利刃的人，会被难以言喻的怒火所吞噬。
languages.original_text: An imposing blade covered in blood that never clots. The wielder is consumed by unspeakable rage while holding this sword.

traits.locale_text: 气势非凡的刀刃上，沾满了永不凝固的鲜血。手持这把利刃的人，会被难以言喻的怒火所吞噬。

languages.text: Une épée imposante couverte de sang qui ne coagule pas. Quiconque brandit cette arme est pris d'une rage folle.
languages.original_text: An imposing blade covered in blood that never clots. The wielder is consumed by unspeakable rage while holding this sword.

traits.locale_text: Une épée imposante couverte de sang qui ne coagule pas. Quiconque brandit cette arme est pris d'une rage folle.

languages.text: 決して固まらない血に覆われた堂々たる剣。持ち主は、この剣を持つ間、筆舌に尽くし難い怒りに飲み込まれる。
languages.original_text: An imposing blade covered in blood that never clots. The wielder is consumed by unspeakable rage while holding this sword.

traits.locale_text: 決して固まらない血に覆われた堂々たる剣。持ち主は、この剣を持つ間、筆舌に尽くし難い怒りに飲み込まれる。

languages.text: Eine imposante Klinge, die mit niemals gerinnendem Blut bedeckt ist. Wer dieses Schwert hält, wird von einem unaussprechlichen Zorn ergriffen.
languages.original_text: An imposing blade covered in blood that never clots. The wielder is consumed by unspeakable rage while holding this sword.

traits.locale_text: Eine imposante Klinge, die mit niemals gerinnendem Blut bedeckt ist. Wer dieses Schwert hält, wird von einem unaussprechlichen Zorn ergriffen.

languages.text: Asla pıhtılaşmayan kanla kaplı, heybetli bir kılıç. Kullanan kişi, bu kılıcı taşırken ağza alınmayacak bir öfkenin esiri olmuş.
languages.original_text: An imposing blade covered in blood that never clots. The wielder is consumed by unspeakable rage while holding this sword.
